H0.text: What musical term means in a majestic, stately or dignified manner. Magnifico

H1.text: What musical term means in a majestic, stately or dignified manner. Grandioso

H2.text: What musical term means in a majestic, stately or dignified manner. Solenne

H3.text: What musical term means in a majestic, stately or dignified manner. Maestoso

A4.text: Maestoso is used to direct performers to play a certain passage of music in a stately, dignified and majestic fashion (sometimes march-like).

A5.text: Maestoso also is associated with the advent of Classicism, Romanticism, and the newer forms of neo-classicism and neo-romanticism.
